items.title: Why these red state Republicans are resisting Trump’s efforts to expand GOP power
items.description: Republicans hold a 40-10 advantage in the state senate but may still reject Trump’s pressure. ‘Hoosiers are very independent.’

items.title: Republicans struggle to unite on health care as Obamacare subsidies expire
items.description: Recent weeks have showcased a free-for-all of competing GOP ideas and reinforced deep partisan divisions over the issue.

items.title: Billionaires are spending massive sums on politics. A backlash brews.
items.description: An anti-oligarch protest in a small Indiana town shows the depth of the national backlash against the concentration of wealth and power.

items.title: Meet the Trump administration’s 12 billionaires
items.description: At a net worth of $390 billion, it’s the wealthiest White House in modern history.

items.title: How a U.S. admiral decided to kill two boat strike survivors
items.description: The controversial order given by Adm. Frank Bradley is under scrutiny from Congress. Inside the most consequential deliberation of his career.
